content.title: Intro
content.content:
1975
Preceded by
1975
1976
Year
1977
Followed by
1977
You may also be looking for Third Age 1976.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1976.

content.title: January
content.content: 25 - Hilary Arthur Reuel, J.R.R. Tolkien's brother, dies.

content.title: April
content.content:
4 - Gervase Mathew, Inkling, dies.
? - Tolkien and The Silmarillion is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - The Father Christmas Letters is first published in the UK.
22 - Actor Sala Baker is born.

content.title: October
content.content:
1-3 - Oxonmoot 1976.
19 - The Father Christmas Letters is published in the US.

content.title: November
content.content: ? - Fantastic November 1976, featuring an article by L. Sprague de Camp about J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - Actor Dean O'Gorman is born.
8 - Actor Dominic Monaghan is born.

? - Milton Waldman dies.
? - C.E. Stevens, Inkling, dies.
? - 1977 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar is released.
? - The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar is released.
? - The Calendar of Imladris 1977 is released.
? - The Tolkien Companion is published.
? - Drawings by Tolkien, an exhibition catalogue, is issued.
? - Mallorn 10 is published.
? - United Artists solds the film, game, and merchandising rights that bought from J.R.R. Tolkien himself to producer Saul Zaentz.




Years
1973 1974 1975 1976 1977 1978 1979
